solution_line_template: Arthur is {arthur_older_than_susan} years older than Susan, so he is {susan_age} + {arthur_older_than_susan} = <<{susan_age}+{arthur_older_than_susan}={arthur_age}>>{arthur_age} years old.
Bob is {bob_age} years old, so Tom is {bob_age} - {tom_younger_than_bob} = <<{bob_age}-{tom_younger_than_bob}={tom_age}>>{tom_age} years old.
So in total these four family members have {bob_age} + {susan_age} + {arthur_age} + {tom_age} = <<{bob_age}+{susan_age}+{arthur_age}+{tom_age}={total_age}>>{total_age} years.
